#summary My configuration for SSH-agent
#labels Phase-Deploy

= Details =

 # Install kde-misc/ksshaskpass
 # Uncomment lines related to ssh-agent in /etc/kde/shutdown/agent-shutdown.sh
 # Add following lines to ~/.bashrc :
{{{
export SSH_ASKPASS="/usr/bin/ksshaskpass"
alias ssh='[[ (`ssh-add -l | grep -c "no identities"` == 1) && `ssh-add -t 1 < /dev/null` ]]; /usr/bin/ssh'
}}}
